festival.introText:
Taking place 25th - 28th May 2023, the award-winning Bearded Theory’s Spring Gathering returns.

With more acts still to be announced as well as the always impressive family and kids activities, comedy line-up and much, much more, Bearded Theory’s Spring Gathering 2023 is literally unmissable.
festival.location: Catton Park in Walton Upon Trent

artists.name: Pigs Pigs Pigs Pigs Pigs Pigs Pigs
The Bar-Steward Sons of Val Doonican

faqs.question: When is Bearded Theory 2023?
faqs.answer: Bearded Theory takes place on Thursday 25th May - Sunday 28th May 2023.

faqs.question: What happens if I bought a ticket and cannot attend?
faqs.answer: Unfortunately we can’t issue you with a refund if you can’t make the event due to work commitments or your mates have dropped out. In these circumstances, we advise passing on your tickets privately to avoid losing out on the money spent. Refunds can only be offered if the event is cancelled or postponed, as agreed upon purchase.

faqs.question: Is there camping available at Bearded Theory?
faqs.answer: Yes, there are camping tickets available at Bearded Theory. See https://beardedtheory.co.uk/faqs/ for more info.

faqs.question: Accessibility information
faqs.answer: All the information on accessibility can be found at https://beardedtheory.co.uk/accessibility/

faqs.question: Where is Bearded Theory?
faqs.answer:
Bearded Theory is located at Catton Park

Walton upon Trent

Derbyshire

DE12 8LN

faqs.question: Does Bearded Theory have any age restrictions?
faqs.answer: No, Bearded Theory is a family-friendly festival. The bars will be operating a Challenge 25 policy so you may need valid photographic ID. (UK Passport, Driving Licence or a PASS ID card)
